getContainerBottomHeight

public int getContainerBottomHeight()
For container, computes the height of the bottom facet. Done in Java instead of an EL because it is just too hard to read in an EL

hasThickBorder

protected boolean hasThickBorder()
By default we consider that a focus node has a thick border. In process this is not always true: a step node in focus does not have a thick border because it is surrounded by the blue step container. so we override the method to cover this case.

Overrides:
hasThickBorder in class AbstractNode
Returns:
true if the node has a thick focus border
